name: (Paper 3) Cambridge Key English Test (KET5) - Speaking Course
intro: (Level A2) Enhance your speaking skills for the Cambridge KET5 exam with this intensive course. You will practice interactive speaking exercises, answer personal questions, and build fluency in real-life conversational contexts. This course will help you gain confidence and prepare thoroughly for the KET5 Speaking paper.
lessonNames: You and your partner will discuss a given topic. The examiner will ask you to share your opinions and experiences about daily routines, favorite activities, and future plans. You will also describe a memorable experience and explain why it was important to you.
